mostly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to talk about most members of a group, most occasions, most parts of something etc
mostly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Green teas are mostly from China or Japan.
There were about fifteen people in the lounge, mostly women.
He blamed his parents. Mostly he blamed his dad.
mostly.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In written English, people often prefer to use generally or for the most part rather than mostly, because they sound more formal:
Many tourists visit the region, generally for skiing.
The inhabitants of the village are for the most part elderly.
